mapper.select: SELECT NOT_NO as notNo, NOT_TITLE as notTitle, NOT_DATE as notDate, MEM_NO as memNo, NOT_WRITER as notWriter, NOT_CONTENT as notContent, NOT_HITS as notHits, NOT_DEL_YN as notDelYN, NOT_DEL_DATE as notDelDate FROM ALL_NOTICE WHERE NOT_DEL_YN='N' ORDER BY NOT_DATE DESC

select RULE_NO, RULE_TITLE, RULE_CONTENT, RULE_DATE, to_char(RULE_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') as RULE_DATE_FORMAT from (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY RULE_DATE DESC) AS ROW_NUM, CR.* from COMPANY_RULE CR) where ROW_NUM between #{startPage} and #{endPage}
